title: The most accurate interpretations of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream

preview.html: Dreams are a special world, dominated by mystery and secrets, and interpretations abound, which vary according to the circumstances of the vision and according to the circumstances of the viewer, and beauty is one of the absolute values, such as the values ​​of goodness and truth, it is an attribute of God in all religions and the beauty of women embodies the absolute beauty present in the universe and nature and describes the beauty of the soul and morals and praises the beauty of women in visions if it is not awakening to sensual desires, and if the beauty of women is disturbing, this is a bad interpretation, according to the saying of the Noble Messenger: “I did not leave behind me a disorder more severe in men than in women.” Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream Seeing a person dreaming of a beautiful girl promises joy and happiness wherever he is. Seeing a girl in a dream who was thin and ugly or wearing torn and old clothes means problems, misfortunes and fears for her eyesight. Seeing a newborn child or a beautiful newborn in a dream means that it will be a year full of goodness, success, distinction and fulfillment of desires and aspirations, and there will be good luck for both men and women. Seeing a beautiful little girl in a dream is a sign of achieving ambitions and desires and indicates that good luck will be on the side of the dreamer. The dream With a beautiful girl playing in a dream indicates an abundance of goodness and blessings, an abundance of sustenance, and the success of God Almighty in what the dreamer seeks. Seeing yourself taking something from a beautiful girl in a dream means happiness, receiving good and happy news, and many happy occasions to come. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to a child and live with her father. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: This dream is one of the abhorrent signs, and it is not desirable to see it in a dream; because it is an indication of troubles and fears. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, is evidence of an increase in good offspring, an abundance of sustenance, and an abundance of kindness. The dream of giving birth to a beautiful girl in a dream also indicates health, prosperity, longevity, good news, and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations. Seeing a beautiful veiled girl in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will perform the Hajj and Umrah and visit the Grand Mosque. Seeing a beautiful girl being kissed in a dream. It means hearing happy news, many happy occasions, the return of the absent, and the disappearance of worries and sorrows. Seeing a beautiful unknown girl in a dream is a desirable vision and a sign of kindness to the dreamer and earning a lot of money. Seeing a beautiful woman in a man's dream is a reflection of the meaning and lifestyle of his life and an accurate description of what the dreamer is going through or what he will do in the coming period of his life. Seeing a beautiful girl in a man's dream is a sign of balance and stability in his life during the current and future period. It is better in a man's dream. To see a woman who is known as more beautiful, elegant and attractive, and it is better for this woman to have a reasonable name, because it clearly indicates the way of life and human opinion in general. Dancing in a dream is not praiseworthy, and it is one of the signs of misery in the world, as singing and all manifestations of noise and distraction are hated by the sight. If you have a

title: Interpretation of carpet in a dream and carpet in a dream

preview.html: A dream about rugs, carpets, and mattresses. Should I wash rugs and buy green, white, and black carpets for a single, married, pregnant, or divorced woman? For a man according to Ibn Sirin. However, a carpet in a dream is one of the strange dreams that we see differently in the dream, as it has many interpretations that come to every person in the dream, depending on the specific situation of the dreamer. And his vision is complete, including them. The full interpretation is given to seeing a carpet, as it is one of the important things in our lives that we resort to when resting. In our article today, we examine for you the interpretation of seeing a carpet in a dream according to the great international translator Ibn Sirin, who explained it completely. Interpretation of a carpet in a dream If you see a carpet in your dream, this indicates On bliss, comfortable living, comfort, happiness and tranquility. Whoever sees that the carpet is spread out for him, then this is a world in front of him with its joys and pleasures, and vice versa, and if it is folded, the world will turn away from you. An unknown carpet in an unknown place is accompanied by strangers in the glory of alienation. A thin or worn carpet is short-lived. Burning, theft, or tampering with the carpet indicates Weakness of goals and implementation of solutions. The interpretation of the carpet in a dream depends on its shape and condition as well as on the other symbols present in it. Seeing other people sitting with you on the carpet indicates their protection and participation. If they are wise, you will gain wisdom, and if they are among the highest people, you will work for something beyond your ability. And if they are poor, The poor will enjoy a decent life. In general, the appearance of a carpet in your dream means prolonging life, honor, and transcendence. Interpretation of a carpet in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees a carpet in a dream is evidence of marriage. For a girl to see herself sleeping on a beautiful and wonderful carpet, this is evidence of her marriage to a wealthy man in The coming period. For a girl to see that she is sleeping on a torn and uncomfortable carpet, this is evidence that she will be associated with a person who does not have a good personality. Seeing a girl sleeping on an unfamiliar carpet without the knowledge of its owner is evidence of her high status. Seeing a girl sleeping on a white carpet is evidence of marriage. From a man close to his Lord. A girl who sleeps on a green carpet is evidence of marriage to an honest and serious man. Seeing a black carpet in a dream is evidence that you are marrying a corrupt man. Interpretation of a carpet in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman sitting on a silk carpet is evidence of a life She is beautiful in her home, and seeing her sitting on a rug of poor cloth is evidence of the hardship of life. For a married woman to see that she has a white rug is evidence that her husband is close to God. A married woman sitting on a green rug indicates that her husband is an honest man. A married woman sitting on a rug Black is evidence of her husband’s bad intentions. Seeing a married woman sitting on a carpet eating a mouse is evidence of the corruption of her life with her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is buying a new beautiful carpet, this is evidence of an improvement in her life. A married woman’s opinion that she is selling her carpets is evidence of the destruction of her home. Interpretation of a carpet in a man’s dream: Seeing a man in a dream that he is selling his carpet is evidence of divorce or death

title: Seeing four rings in a dream

preview.html: For a man, there is no good in a dream if the ring is made of gold, so in today’s article from our website gptafser.com/ we will show you the interpretation of seeing four rings in a dream, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing four rings in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees a ring in In a dream, it may be a sign of her marriage. Wearing a ring in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign that a man will propose to her soon. Or she will get married, if she sees that someone has given her the ring. Rejecting the ring in a dream when someone offers it to her does not It deserves praise. It symbolizes that she will lose her lover, and God knows best. Seeing a gold ring when it is broken in a dream is unfavorable. This indicates a relationship that will not take place with her fiancé. Losing a golden ring in a dream is not worthy of praise. It indicates that the engagement did not take place or She will stay away from her fiancé, God willing, knows best. In the event that the golden ring is filled with a lot of silver and diamonds. She declares that the one who proposes to her is a man who has money and knowledge and is close to God Almighty. When a single girl sees many rings on her hands, she wears them. A sign that she will be She is happy with her intimate relationship, God willing. The vision of wearing rings filled with rare lobes in a dream that also contain rubies. It indicates that she will marry someone who also has a high status, but who has feelings of love. Buying a ring in an unmarried girl’s dream is a good vision that brings Kindness. That he will have the ability to possess. Or it may be a sign of things that will happen in her life that will bring her happiness. The girl who buys the ring in her dream. This vision indicates that she will enjoy her life as good things can happen if the ring is filled with delicate and bright lobes. Seeing an unmarried girl seeing two gold rings in her dream indicates the pleasant skin that will happen to her in the case of her fiancé soon. The previous dream may be a good sign of the state of joy and happiness in which she will live, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a golden ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a vision Four rings in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees in her dream that someone has given her a gold ring and then she wears it. This dream is a good sign that indicates the abundance of money that she will obtain, God willing. The previous dream suggests that good news will reach the man who gave her the ring in her dream, God willing. In a dream, he gave his wife the ring and put it on her. It indicates the goodness and livelihood that she will receive. Seeing the golden ring inside her left hand is a sign that he will live in a state of marital stability and that his relationship will be filled with happiness, thanks to God. It is good to see the ring on the left hand if it is wide. It symbolizes what will happen to her and will improve her, God willing. Also, the ring is on the right hand and is worn by a married woman. It says that she will live a happy married life, and she will be very happy with it. The appearance of happiness for a married woman when she wears the ring on her right hand. It indicates that she will obtain a livelihood. Abundant and abundance of goodness, God willing. Perhaps the previous dream has another meaning, which is that...

title: Interpretation of smell in a dream: Smell of perfume in a dream

preview.html: A dream about smelling something for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man and a young man, whether it smells good or bad, or a spray from a bottle of Ibn Sirin. Al-Tayeb Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Smelling in a dream carries many connotations and meanings for us in our dreams. We will learn about the symbols of perfumes in a dream as interpreted by leading scholars through the following lines, as perfumes are among the things we use all the time in daily life. Interpretation of smell in a dream. Who do you smell in a dream? A good smell causes a mild illness, and a bad smell means bad speech, or for someone who smells bad. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream: Seeing perfumes with a beautiful smell symbolizes goodness, wealth, and money. It also symbolizes a blessing that the dreamer will receive in his life. It also symbolizes the wealth of the poor and the wealth of the rich. And increasing one's livelihood and money. Perfume in a dream symbolizes comfort and good and happy news. Seeing and using perfume on a sick person symbolizes death. Perfume also symbolizes the good biography of the pioneer and his position among the people. Seeing perfume also symbolizes blessings, livelihood, and money, as well as the repentance of the sinner and the guidance of the sinner. But if he sees a perfume bottle broken because of immorality and false actions, then he must repent to God Almighty. Also, seeing a fake and corrupt perfume symbolizes the fortuneteller’s deception and his lies to the people around him. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a single woman. Seeing perfume for a girl symbolizes good behavior among people. And good manners and kindness. As for the dream of inhaling perfume, this symbolizes the good news that the girl will receive in the near future. Also, the vision of buying perfume symbolizes marriage to a good man, while the girl’s sadness when she buys perfume symbolizes an unhappy marriage. Perfume in the girl’s dream It symbolizes her morals and preserves her reputation and honor. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a married woman. Seeing perfume symbolizes marital happiness, family, and emotional stability between her and her husband. Seeing perfumes in a dream also symbolizes kindness, sustenance, and a good reputation in life for the pioneer. Also, seeing inhaling perfume symbolizes success. Children and their blessings, as well as the prestigious job of her husband soon, God willing. Perfume in a wife’s dream is a symbol of her good and good reputation, as well as marital happiness and emotional stability. Buying perfume in a dream symbolizes pregnancy in the near future for the wife and also symbolizes love and affection between her and her life partner. Interpretation of perfume In a pregnant woman’s dream, perfume in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes the birth of a girl, as well as the gender of the baby. As for the black musk perfume, it symbolizes the baby, God willing. Also, seeing perfume sprays symbolizes getting rid of pain and healing from diseases, God willing. Inhaling perfume also symbolizes Acquiring goods and money, God willing, and it is a symbol of the happy and enjoyable events that await you. Interpretation of perfumes in a dream for a man. Perfume in a man’s dream symbolizes marriage or his offspring soon, God willing. Musk perfume in a dream symbolizes a lot of money.

title: Interpretation of dreams of someone who wants to bewitch me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about someone who wants to charm me in a dream for single and divorced women, and what are the signs that the vision shows? This vision is one of the ominous visions, as magic is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an and causes a lot of harm. Therefore, the vision may bring you some problems and may be an indication of the presence of unjust people who commit atrocities, and we will learn about all the interpretations related to this vision through this article.Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch me in a dream is one of the dreams that witness many Among the interpretations, such as: If someone wants to bewitch him, this is evidence that there is a hypocritical person in your life who is arranging many bad deeds for you. If you see someone performing magic on you, this indicates that there are many problems in your life, and as for seeing an old man performing magic, This means the hypocrisy of that person and his family, which leads to suspicion and self-deception. What is the interpretation of seeing magic in a single woman’s dream? Seeing magic can be one of the common visions in a single girl’s life and it carries the following clues: If a girl sees that someone is performing magic on her in a dream, This means that she will be associated with a person who brings her a lot of evil, and she will live with him a life full of problems and sins, and she must be careful. Jurists say: If an unmarried woman sees that someone is preparing magic for her, this means that she is engaged to a hypocritical man, and this vision may express the weakness of religion and the weakness of her relationship with her Lord. And she must. Repent and turn away from the love of this world. For an unmarried woman to see that a girl is preparing to perform magic for her, means that there is a woman near her who is leading her on the path of disobedience and sins and her inability to escape from it. Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing a magician chasing a girl is evidence of the presence of an evil person chasing her and one must To beware of it. Recurring dreams of amulets and magical writings that psychologists say are the result of negative thoughts and a pathological fear of magic, which makes her see these things often. Interpretation of a dream about someone who wants to bewitch me in a dream about a married woman. Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees magic in In a dream, this means that she is living in a state of instability and problems in her life and is seeking to get rid of them by all means. Seeing someone trying to charm you is an expression of the presence of a deceitful person in your life who seeks to destroy it in every way, whether by trickery or cunning and deception, and to get close to you, and you must be careful. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing magic in a married woman’s dream is an expression of failure in managing family affairs and the inability to act wisely, which makes her dream of magic get her out of trouble. If a married woman sees the presence of a priest or magician in her home, this vision is undesirable and indicates That she will be exposed to danger and must be very careful with the presence of others in her life. But if she sees that magic has befallen her, this means that a calamity will occur or that she will be separated from her husband, God forbid. Ibn Sirin says that if a married woman sees in her dream that she can complete many tasks through magic, this means that she

If a married woman sees the presence of a priest or magician in her home, this vision is undesirable and indicates That she will be exposed to danger and must be very careful with the presence of others in her life. But if she sees that magic has befallen her, this means that a calamity will occur or that she will be separated from her husband, God forbid. title: What is the interpretation of the symbol of makeup in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the symbol of makeup in a dream? Makeup can be defined as a set of materials and tools that a woman uses to reach a high level of beauty. An indication of the coming of goodness and joy, but some interpretation scholars have proven the opposite, by examining the condition of the dreamer before they engage in interpreting his dream, and this is what many interpretation scholars from everywhere have said. The world relied on it. Interpretation of the symbol of makeup in a dream. The general meaning of makeup in a dream. Dreaming about makeup is one of the visions that indicate the coming of goodness, and none of the interpreters mentioned any harm in interpreting these visions. Interpretation of make-up tools in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is putting make-up on her face, then this dream indicates that this woman will hear good news in the near future that will make her married life happy. A married woman dreams of putting on make-up, but she is not comfortable with it and feels comfortable when Remove it and this dream shows her that she must know that beauty is not in external beauty, but rather it is real. Beauty is good manners and kindness to others. And when she dreams that her husband is putting makeup on her face, this vision indicates that her husband is hiding many things from her. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a divorced woman. A divorced woman who sees that she is putting makeup on in her dream foretells that her coming days will be more beautiful, God willing. And God will compensate her for the difficult days she lived. And if she sees that she is buying makeup, this means that many good things await her, and it may mean that there is someone who proposes to her, and this person is good, pious, and protects her. And fear God in them. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams of putting makeup on her face, then this dream indicates that her next few days will be full of happiness and surprises that will satisfy her. Among the interpretations that were narrated about an unmarried girl putting makeup in her dream, this is The dream expresses the existence of someone who will marry her and who is characterized by justice and good morals and who will agree to that. Flirt and be happy with her. An unmarried girl who wears makeup in a dream and sees herself as beautiful in the end shows her extensive relationships with the people around her and that she is a sociable and kind person who is good at knowing others and dealing with them. But if she sees that she is wearing make-up and that her appearance is bad, then this dream indicates the girl’s introverted personality who is not good at establishing relationships with others or talking to them. Interpretation of Make-up Tools: A woman who sees that she is buying make-up tools in a dream, her dream indicates that the happiness she is looking for in her life Professional and emotional are very close to her. Some dream interpretation researchers reported that seeing a woman buying cosmetics means that she has good inner strength and sincere feelings for others. And for a married woman who sees that she is buying cosmetics in her dream, this dream indicates the arrival of promising good news in her life, She has been waiting for it for a long time. If she sees that she is buying expensive cosmetics, this means that she will...

title: Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of chickpeas in a dream The interpretation of chickpeas in a dream is considered one of the most controversial visions for many people. Chickpeas have many benefits for humans. Therefore, people like to eat it as food, and seeing chickpeas in a dream varies depending on how the fortuneteller saw it. Seeing chickpeas when harvested is different from seeing them when they are green. It varies depending on the dreamer. A married woman’s vision of chickpeas has a different interpretation than an unmarried woman’s vision. A pregnant woman’s vision differs from her, and a man’s vision of chickpeas is not compatible with a woman’s vision, because interpretations differ accordingly. Interpretation of seeing chickpeas in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman dreams that she She eats chickpeas and chickpeas are soft. This is evidence that good news awaits the girl, but if the single woman sees that the chickpeas she is eating are dry. This is evidence that this woman will face many difficult problems in her life that will prevent her from continuing on her planned path. But if a single woman sees chickpeas in a dream; This is evidence that God Almighty gives her a lot of good and poor things, and if the unmarried woman sees that she is buying chickpeas during her sleep, and she sees that she is buying someone she knows. This is evidence that this person will propose to her, but if the unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is preparing chickpeas and putting them in a bowl big. This is evidence that this woman will soon have a happy opportunity and that she is preparing for this occasion, but if an unmarried woman sees that she wants to eat chickpeas in a dream and someone prevents her. This is evidence that this person will ruin her marriage, but if an unmarried woman dreams that she is buying chickpeas for someone in a dream. This is evidence of this girl’s love for this person and her willingness to sacrifice everything she has for his happiness. Interpretation of seeing a married chick in a dream: If a married woman sees that she is preparing chickpeas for her husband and children; This is evidence that this woman manages her household affairs with all wisdom, and that this woman works to stabilize marital life, and evidence that this woman raises her children well, and that her children have a bright future. she has. Their scientific or practical life, because these children will be loyal, she has the right to take care of them in her old age, as she took care of them when they were young, and this woman will be proud of them and she will be. Proud of her. But if a married woman sees that her husband is feeding her chickpeas with his hand, this is evidence that this husband works to make his wife happy, and that he works hard at his work. To achieve what she wants to achieve in her husband, and this is also evidence that she is taking every possible means to achieve marital life and for a better future for the children. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is feeding her husband chickpeas, then this is true. This is evidence that this woman is loyal to her husband, loves him deeply, and is ready to make all sacrifices to live with him. However, if a married woman sees in a dream that another woman is feeding her husband chickpeas, this is evidence that this woman loves her husband and is trying to steal him from her. Interpretation of seeing chickpeas in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees chickpeas in a dream, this is evidence

title: Interpretation of dreams about figs who sees picking figs in a dream

preview.html: Seeing figs in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man eating figs. I dreamed that I picked dry figs from a tree, garden, or orchard, black or green figs by Ibn Sirin, and other figs in a dream are among the strange dreams that we constantly see in a dream and they can cause a lot of anxiety. Because of the strange dream, as figs are one of the dreams that have not been widely reported by all interpreters around the world as figs are one of the beautiful fruits that appear especially in the summer, and the reason for seeing them in a dream is that he misses them if someone loves them. After So, we review the interpretation of seeing figs in a dream by the great international translator Ibn Katheer, who explained it completely. Interpretation of a dream about a fig tree: The fig tree indicates money and wealth, as well as wealth, as is evident from some of the interpreters’ sayings, to show sadness and concern for the one who ate it or owned it. Whoever sees that it is planted A fig tree means he will build a new house after he earns a living, or he will create a new house through marriage if he is single, unmarried, or male, and it is said: his crops are his money. He invests in lawful work, and it grows and grows like a fig tree after he plants it and it bears its fruits for him. Whoever collects figs from the tree takes money in proportion to the amount of fruit he collects, and if he collects and eats, it is better for diet and life, and if he collects them and throws them on the ground, then he does so. He loses a lot of money that the man throws to him or a commodity that he loses. If he collects it and puts it in a bowl, then the dreamer is a person who seeks to reorganize his life in order to return to his success again. If one tries to cut down the tree, he will fall into long distress, and if one tries to collect the fruits If he cuts a branch, one of its limbs will break. Either through demolition and collapse, or through corruption and scandal, or at the hands of disabled children. Seeing figs in a dream is a sign of good and upcoming wealth for a person. Seeing someone giving him figs in his home is evidence that he will become wealthy. Seeing figs in a dream is evidence of the pregnancy of a married woman. Interpretation A fig tree in a dream for a single woman. A girl seeing one fig in a dream is evidence that she will become very good. A girl who sees figs in a dream is evidence that her husband will honor her very much and feel love towards him. A girl seeing figs in a dream is evidence that she will reach the highest positions. An unmarried girl eating dried figs in a dream is a sign of blessing and strength. Seeing an unmarried woman eating figs in her dream is evidence of her close connection. Interpretation of a fig tree in a dream for a married woman. A married woman eating figs in a dream indicates problems and anxiety. Seeing a married woman eating figs From her husband in a dream means that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing a married woman eating dried figs in a dream is evidence of her recovery from illness. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that there is good news on her way. Interpretation of a fig tree in a dream for a man. A man who sees a fig tree in a dream is evidence However, his work has many benefits. A man eats figs in a dream,

title: Interpretation of dreams about my mother-in-law dancing in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of my husband’s mother dancing in a dream conflicts with the interpretations, but they convey scholars’ interpretations. Dream interpretation of my husband’s mother dancing in a dream If one sees the husband’s mother dancing in a dream, this may indicate some problems that are plaguing the dreamer at that time. The dream could be of a dance The husband’s mother is a sign of the worries that afflict the dreamer in those days. If you see your husband’s mother dancing in a dream, this may indicate some solutions to the problems and crises that the woman is suffering from at that time. Perhaps seeing the husband’s mother dancing in a dream indicates bad events. In his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about requesting a divorce from my husband in a dream. Anyone who dreams that she asks for a divorce in a dream may indicate that she was not comfortable at that time. A dream about requesting a divorce from her husband in a dream may indicate the intense pressure that she feels During this time, and God knows best. The dream of requesting a divorce from the husband may indicate some serious changes that happen to them during those days. It is possible that the dream of requesting a divorce from the husband in a dream may indicate a change in events, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband’s mother dying in A dream: Whoever sees in a dream that his husband’s mother died in a dream, it may indicate severe repentance for committing some sins in those days. In the case of seeing the husband’s mother dying in a dream, this may indicate a serious mistake that a person may suffer from during this period, and God knows best. It is possible. Seeing the mother of the deceased husband in a dream indicates that things will be facilitated and final during this period, praise be to God. In the case of seeing the husband’s mother in a dream, this may indicate good morals and good treatment between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about me getting married to my husband for the second time in a dream. If a woman sees that her husband got married In a dream, this may indicate her need for family happiness in those days, and God knows best. A husband’s dream of marrying another woman in a dream may indicate the great joy that will come to them during this time. If you see the husband marrying another woman, this may indicate some The crises and problems that this family is going through and that he will get rid of them soon, and God knows best. In the event that he dreams of marrying another woman, this may indicate the blessing and many good things that he will obtain by God’s grace. Interpretation of dreams about my father-in-law harassing me in a dreamIn the case of a dream in which my father appears The husband is harassing its owner, the dream may indicate some problems that they are facing during this time. A mother-in-law harassing a woman in a dream may indicate serious family conflicts that she may face in those days. Dreaming about a father-in-law harming a woman in a dream may indicate some problems that arise during this period, and God knows best.
